title: Flag of Czech Republic
cardDescription: The flag of the Czech Republic is two equal horizontal bands of white and red with a blue triangle on the hoist side. The flag is the same as the flag of the former Czechoslovakia.
description: The flag of the Czech Republic is two equal horizontal bands of white and red with a blue triangle on the hoist side. The flag is the same as the flag of the former Czechoslovakia.

content.content: Designing this pattern had two options: either make a sharp tip for the triangle and have odd number of rows but the bands would not be equal, or make the bands equal with even number of rows but leave the tip of the triangle blunt.
This pattern is worked horizontally starting from top left.

content: With A, ch 29, sc in 2nd ch, sc 26, sab, turn
